properties.name: latitude
properties.description: a double representing the position's latitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: A double representing the position's longitude in decimal degrees.

properties.name: accuracy
properties.description: A double representing the accuracy of the latitude and longitude properties,expressed in meters.

properties.name: altitude
properties.description: A double representing the position's altitude in metres, relative to sealevel. This value can be null if the implementation cannot provide the data.

properties.name: altitudeAccuracy
properties.description: A double representing the accuracy of the altitude expressed in meters.This value can be null.

properties.name: heading
properties.description: A double representing the direction in which the device is traveling. Thisvalue, specified in degrees, indicates how far off from heading true norththe device is. 0 degrees represents true north, and the direction isdetermined clockwise (which means that east is 90 degrees and west is 270degrees). If speed is 0, heading is NaN. If the device is unable to provideheading information, this value is null.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: A double representing the velocity of the device in meters per second.This value can be null.
